DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::Relationships(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::Relationships(3)

NAME

DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::Relationships - Emulate has_a(), has_many(), might_have() and meta_info()

DESCRIPTION

Emulate "has_a", "has_many", "might_have" and "meta_info".

FURTHER QUESTIONS?

Check the list of additional DBIC resources.
